NARRATION: Is startled by the sneaky Riena and her instincts kick in. Behind Riena, a shadow rises from the ground, as another Nua holding a scythe places the blade against her skin. As soon as her autumn echo is summoned, it vanishes as Nua recognizes the voice. She turns and looks up at Riena, "Gods damn it, you frightened me" After a moment of allowing herself to calm down, she turns around in Riena's arms to face her. The halberd falls to the floor next to them as both hands grip Riena's suspenders and pulls her down into a deep kiss. After a few seconds, she pulls herself back and her eyes look away from Riena. She speaks, almost in a whisper in Elvish, ||"I.. I want you to fight me..."||, still not noticing how drunk Riena may or may not be, she can't quite look up at the woman before her. N:Nuathavel extends a hand out to her side. The Halbert on the ground shimmers before vanishing, only to appear again in her hand. She lowers her stance, holding the shaft so the tip is pointed toward the ground. Her eyes meet Riena's and despite her fierceness, there was a desperation in her shaking eyes. "No... I." She tightens her grasp on her weapon "I need to prove to you... no, to myself, that I don't need to be protected. That I have the strength needed to be able to go ||home||."
